price: Nimutsimbatare rero kw’idini ry’ubwislamu, ukwemera-ndemanwa kuvuye ku Mana Allah, nta kwemera-ndemanwa rero kwoza gusumba ukwemera ndemanwa Imana Allah Yaremanye abantu. Nimuvyemange rero maze muvuge muti: “Twebwe Iyo Mana Allah ni Yo twiyegereza mu vyo dukora vyose tukanayisenga mu gukurikira idini rya Ibrahimu ry’ubwislamu”.
arabic: صِبۡغَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ صِبۡغَةٗۖ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ عَٰبِدُونَ

meta.transliteration: ṣib'ghata al-lahi waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ṣib'ghatan wanaḥnu lahu ʿābidūna
